unnormalised: Arrey yaar, crypto mein invest karke toh Rs. 5000 bhi dub gaye! Now I'm back to good old FD's, even if the interest rate is only 6.5% p.a. At least I won't wake up to find my life savings have vanished faster than jalebis at a wedding! Maybe I'll stick to betting on the India vs. Pakistan match; better odds there, I tell you.
normalised: Arrey yaar, crypto mein invest karke toh rupee five thousand bhi dub gaye! Now I'm back to good old F-D's, even if the interest rate is only six point five percent per annum. At least I won't wake up to find my life savings have vanished faster than jalebis at a wedding! Maybe I'll stick to betting on the India versus Pakistan match; better odds there, I tell you.
